original_title: Dragons and Rings: Stone and Crop Circles, UFOs and the Paranormal
overview: Was it by chance or did an elder human race really have intricate knowledge of the dynamics of inter-dimensionsinal reality thousands of years ago? Put The Magick Into Your Life.
tagline: Steve Mitchell reveals the truth about ancient stone monuments, crop circles and the world of dragon lore.
title: Dragons and Rings: Stone and Crop Circles, UFOs and the Paranormal
